extendedInfo.description: # FREE EVENT FINDER #Evntogram helps making the most out of your music event. We are shaping the future of human interaction at festivals, concerts, club nights and all other music events. Evntogram is the ideal music event discovery app designed to help event organizers and artists communicate with attendees while giving them the best social and fun experience. We are helping event organizers to create, manage and promote events.Evntogram can use the music library on your iPhone to recommend events of your favourite artists. That's just the cream of the cappuccino. Evntogram brings you all artist details, lineup, location map and running order (timetable) right into your pocket so you never miss an acts again!+ Discover recommended upcoming events by your special interests and find out who else will be attending. + Get suggestions of party peoples, that fits your past and upcoming event forecasts and checkins.+ See all informations about the lineup, location etc. and buy your tickets or book hotels.+ Take the challenge to become the most active user of an event or artist and get specials coins to win a chance for VIP, Backstage or Meet & Greets.+ Get to know people who share your interests.+ Search for events in your area or at any other location.Stay up-to-date where your favourite bands are performing and download the app for free.evntogram - digital event management made easy!Download Now for FREE!!
